review: Greatest part of this device is the supplied remote. It comes pretty loaded with almost all the apps needed.
author: Daniel

review: It does as advertised. Another great Amazon product. Even an electronic naif like me can plug it in and use it.
author: Donna Haworth

review: Really really a fan.  I have Pandora playing all day in our kitchen on a small TV, and we can transport the USB firestick to the larger TV to do movie night.  Defintely worth $40.  Had problems in the beginning with it drawing off the wi-fi pretty slowly, but it has seemed to have fixed itself after 2 months and has been amazing!
author: Jennifer Pekarek

review: I have been using it quite some time now.  The only thing is sometimes it just keeps loading the show and then I just have to unplug and plug it again to make it load faster.  Other than that, I don't have any other problem with it.
author: Drj2zee

review: Worked for a month.  Now blue screen and content disabled .  Looked it up and no real fix.  I am returning

review: We have 3 different devices to stream video and this is the worst of them. It freezes, locks up, doesn't connect etc. Spend less money promoting your defective product and fix it!
